participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, enjoys helping others and has a deep love for animals.
participant_1.background: i like to listen to rock music while working. i help tend the fields. i like to ride horses. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and reflective, he values community service and has a strong interest in history.
participant_2.background: i volunteer at a soup kitchen. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries.

content.text: hi, how are you? I am a farmer. what do you do?
I am a voluteer at a soup kitchen.
that sounds like a lot of fun. do you have any pets? I have two
No I haven't. What kind of pets do you have?
I have a cat. what about you? do you like music? I like rock
